summary: A comprehensive utility class that encapsulates AWS SageMaker service operations, offering a unified set of actions to provision, configure, query, modify, and clean up SageMaker resources such as models, endpoints, jobs, pipelines, notebooks, experiments, and related metadata.
business_intent: Enable developers and automation tools to programmatically orchestrate the full lifecycle of machineâ€‘learning assets on SageMaker, reducing boilerplate code and streamlining workflow management.
